name: Fr. Photios Dumont
title: Proistamenos
bio: Fr. Photios Dumont serves as the Proistamenos (Lead Pastor) of Saint Demetrios Greek Orthodox Church, guiding the community in faith, worship, and service.

name: Fr. Spyridon Rice
title: Presbyter
bio: Fr. Spyridon Rice serves as an Associate Pastor, supporting the liturgical life and pastoral care of the parish community.

name: Dn. Perry Angelos
title: Deacon
bio: Deacon Perry Angelos assists in the liturgical services and supports the parish ministries and outreach programs.
